ComicInfo.Summary: Chaos begins to culminate as a rampaging Areala is hunted through the halls of the St. Illumine Church, after being charged for the attacks on several Magic Priests. Through extensive investigation, the church's supercomputer Gabriel has concluded that Ariel has been infected with a techno-virus by agents of Ivan Seethe. Once introduced into the body, the virus slowly takes over the victim's central nervous system, transforming them it into a living, breathing machine controlled by Seethe himself! Now precious moments begin to waste away as Father Gomez and the Magic Priests hunt down Areala in a desperate attempt to save her from a virus that could ultimately strip her of her humanity!
